pullrequest.title: Refactored the joint control widget so that all three tabs can scroll when many joints are displayed

content.raw:
Hi Jason,
we've merged dev into default, can you try to pull upstream in your fork and update this pull request?

in your forked local repo,

hg pull ssh://hg@bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo

hg merge

hg push

then, go to the pull request link (#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/25/refactored-the-joint-control-widget-so/activity), click "Edit" to update the request.

Thanks,
John

pullrequest.title: Refactored the joint control widget so that all three tabs can scroll when many joints are displayed

content.raw: I had removed the changeset from my local copy because I was going to rebase it to the dev branch.  So I'm not sure anything got merged for this.  I had some conflicts with the dev branch so I haven't push up the final changes yet.  So I guess I need to create a new pull request?

content.raw:
Hi Jason,
not sure why bitbucket labels your patch as merged when it's not.  might be a bitbucket bug.
Yes, please create a new pull request against dev.
Thanks,
John
